title: Communicate like a Boss!
description: Pitch your business model to a panel of investors, make your first sale, and practice your presentation skills in the Envoy English Business Course: Communicate like a Boss!
communication_goal: Improve your pitching and presentation skills. Practice persuading others of your ideas in a professional setting. Gain confidance speaking to investors, customers, teammates, and other business people.
vocabulary_goal: Learn to describe various industries, products, companies, and customers using common business terms.
grammar_goal: Review relevant grammar topics each week to prepare you for your upcoming Mission!

weeks.mission_description: You just started a company, and you need some investment. Can you persuade the investors to fund your new business?
weeks.workshop_description: Describe industries, products, customers, and general business terms. Learn communication strategies for your upcoming Mission.

weeks.mission_description: You just launched your first company, but you face fierce competition. Can you pitch your product to win your first sale?
Your company has just released a new product, but something has gone terribly wrong. Can you resolve all of the customer service complaints before the time is up?
You are your teammates want to start a company, but you all have different ideas about what the company should be. Can you reach an agreement and present your final business plan?
